day0.visual_issue: The 'Add to Cart' button looks disabled, while the 'Subscribe' button looks primary.
day0.functional_issue: Clicking 'Add to Cart' provides only a vague 'Done' feedback without details.

day1.visual_issue: The calendar navigation arrows are visually swapped (Next is on the left).
day1.functional_issue: The system allows selecting past dates and errors out only after submission.

day2.visual_issue: Labels display raw internal variable names (e.g., USR_CFG) instead of natural language.
day2.functional_issue: Saving changes triggers a cryptic system error code (0x8004...) with no solution.

day3.visual_issue: The 'Post' button is misleadingly labeled 'Save' with a floppy disk icon.
day3.functional_issue: Content is published immediately without confirmation and cannot be deleted (No Undo).

day4.visual_issue: Labels are positioned confusingly below the input fields, violating proximity principles.
day4.functional_issue: The prominent primary button acts as a 'Reset' trap that clears all inputs.

day5.visual_issue: The 'Cancel Subscription' button is visually disguised as unclickable text.
day5.functional_issue: The cancellation flow leads to a fake system error (Dead End) preventing exit.

day6.visual_issue: The delete button uses confusing jargon ('Deprovision') and positive blue styling.
day6.functional_issue: The confirmation dialog is ambiguous ('Commit transaction?') and results in deletion.

day7.visual_issue: Single-choice options (Size) use square checkboxes; Multi-choice options (Toppings) use round radios.
day7.functional_issue: Changing the size silently resets all selected toppings without warning.
